review: Before I purchased this device I checked the Roku website to verify I wouldn't have to use a credit card for anything else regarding usage of this device. I only purchased this device to watch Amazon Prime to which I subscribe. Much to my dismay, to activate the thing you have to open a Roku Account and provide them with a credit card or PayPal account. Having been the victim of identity theft from my information being held on insecure websites, I absolutely hate this hustle by Roku. Now I have to watch my credit card activity even more.I think I'm going to return the thing and either pick another device that enables me to use my Amazon Prime without a 2nd party requiring access to my credit card.I wish they would have openly stated this on their website. I wouldn't have ordered it. But maybe that's the reason they don't clearly publish it.Garbage!!!

review: Very disappointed. I bought two of these due to the size and convenance. Worked fine until my old one, had three ROKU total, went out of warranty. When I had a problem connecting with the old one all three were affected. Call ROKU to get help and was told I needed to pruchase an extened warranty are pay 9.99 each time I call in for custmer service.I went ahead and got them going and less than three weeks later I had the same issue. Threw the old one away thinking that would solve my issue. It did not so all of them have gone in the trash. I will not be held hostage by a product that is supposed to be one upfront cost with on subscription fee. I will find another way to watch Netflixs and Amazon Prime.
